category_subtitle: Post-Super Bowl Recovery ‚Äî It's Pizza Time!

rounds.pro_tip: SURFACE TEXTURE: Real pizza has uneven char patterns, irregular bubble formation, and natural oil pooling. AI pizza tends to have suspiciously uniform cheese distribution.
CHEESE PHYSICS: Real melted cheese stretches with organic, random breakpoints. AI cheese often looks like smooth plastic or stretches too uniformly.
GREASE PATTERNS: Real pepperoni produces small pools of orange grease in uneven distribution. AI often misses these subtle liquid details.
HANDS & FINGERS: Look at the hands. AI frequently generates extra or fused fingers, impossible joint angles, or blurred fingertips.
DEPTH OF FIELD: Real cameras create natural bokeh with gradual focus falloff. AI images often have abrupt transitions between sharp and blurry areas.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî brick pizza oven with flames (DALL-E 3)
rounds.pro_tip: FIRE & FLAME: Real flames are chaotic with unpredictable edges and translucent tips. AI fire often looks like a smooth gradient blob.
SHADOW CONSISTENCY: Real photos have a single consistent light source. AI sometimes has shadows pointing in multiple directions.
TEXT & LABELS: Look for text on menus, napkins, or bottles. AI frequently generates garbled nonsense text ‚Äî one of the most reliable tells.
MATERIAL TRANSITIONS: Real photos show natural transitions between materials ‚Äî stone to mortar, dough to sauce. AI often blurs these boundaries.
ORGANIC IMPERFECTION: Real tomatoes have blemishes and varied sizes. AI produce is suspiciously perfect ‚Äî uniform coloring, identical shapes.
